channel.title: Welcome to my Personal blog
channel.description: Recent content on Welcome to my Personal blog

item.title: MBA diaries: What would I do differently as an entrepreneur?
item.description: Approximately two years ago, I, with a couple more friends, attempted to start something of our own in the event management industry, which fortunately or unfortunately, failed.

item.title: Millennial Fitness: What they don’t tell you about it!
item.description: There have been tons of articles and videos on how to stay fit, why is it important and how to do it right but no one says for what reasons you should start.

item.title: MBA diaries: The art of negotiations and conflict resolutions
item.description: I was talking to my childhood friend, who was sharing her recent MBA journey.

item.title: Routine Life
item.description: I know I know, the title of this article made you yawn.

item.title: Facing uncertainties
item.description: As a result of quarantine, I had been revisiting my old books and diaries – trying to find my comfort zone through these uncertain times.

item.title: Minimalism
item.description: Do you ever feel sometimes you’re owning more than required? Be it your thoughts or possessions, it is true for both worlds!
